entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Rain showers or drizzle beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
